div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 200 Kyra Vrysi, near Corinth, 1934 (594) Burial: 3rd cent. B.C. (T) Contents: 46 AR, 154 AE Leucas: 1 st. Corinth: 1 st.; 6 dr.; 151 AE Corinth and colonies: 38 AR fr. Sicyon: 3 AE Disposition: Athens AA 1935, p. 178 The unpublished hd. of Corinthian bronzes at Athens, mentioned by Varoucha in E. J. Holmberg, The Swedish Excava- tions at Asea in Arcadia 4: Hellenistic Asea. The Coins. (Lund, 1944), p. 168, note 2, is in all likelihood Kyra Vrysi
